TextView.android:text: Drink plenty of water or juices the morning and night before you donate. To keep your blood sugar up eat Breakfast. Eat healthy food like iron rich foods for 2 weeks before your appointment: for example, spinach, whole grains, eggs, and beef. Don't eat fatty foods for twenty-four hours before you donate Don't smoke on the day before donating. You can smoke 3 hours after donation. Ask for a blanket if your hands or feet start to feel cold. After the donation have a snack. Rest for a few minutes enjoying your snack before leaving the donation site. After your donation try to Eat a meal high in protein: Fish, beef, chicken or legumes are excellent choices. Don't Drink Alcohol as you will not be eligible to donate blood if you have consumed alcohol 48 hours before donation. Try to avoid heavy lifting and strenuous exercise for the rest of the day.
